[applause] these are troubling times in the united states. many americans, including me, have great concerns about the direction that our president and federal government are taking right now. we clearly have, and this is already in place, we clearly have a president who is destroying the federal government. appearances.snippet: senator joni ernst i think had a lot of reasons.he lost her leadership position after the 2024 election. she was under tremendous pressure with a lot of nasty emails and threatening calls during that pete hegseth confirmation and there were other issues. i'm sure everybody remembers her saying at the town hall meeting we all are going to die when challenged about the medicaid cuts and the impact that could have. i think she decided that even though she would have been favored for reelection in iowa, she decided it just was not worth it to her. this state has trended toward republicans so i would say certainly republicans are favored in this open u.s. senate race. ashley hinson is a strong favorite to win the nomination. the democratic primary is a three-way race, a very open right now. and there is excitement among democrats to have an open seat. we have not had a senate race without an incumbent for decades. host: governor kim reynolds is governor of your state that does not have term limits for governor, unlike other states. why i
